entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
